title: Try Your Luck at the Shrine
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Hey Nozomi-chan, letâ€™s try our luck for the New Year and draw fortune slips!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Okay~ ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Alright, letâ€™s go. Great blessing...... Come on! ......Itâ€™s a medium blessing~~! Nozomi-chan, what did you get? ......Wow, awesome! Great blessing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, it seems like my spiritual power is still going strong this year~ ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Awesome. Okay, Iâ€™m going to keep drawing until I also get a great blessing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Huh? Doesnâ€™t that defeat the purpose of trying your luck?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It says here that not giving up this year is super important! So if I keep drawing a fortune slip until I get a great blessing, itâ€™ll further improve my luck! ......Right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I see. Thatâ€™s one way to look at it. ğ…  Well then, Honoka, let me share my spiritual power with you so you can draw a great blessing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wow, your hand is so warm, Nozomi-chan. Okay, I think Iâ€™m going to pull a great blessing this time! Watch this, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Alrighty~ ğ…  If you draw a great blessing, we can go tie it to a tree together. ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
